name: bnomei/kirby3-autoid
description: Automatic unique ID for Pages, StructureObjects and Files including performant helpers to retrieve them. Bonus: Cache for collections.

scripts.dev-zip: rm kirby3-autoid.zip; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; composer archive --format=zip --file=kirby3-autoid; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0'; composer dumpautoload -o;
scripts.zip: rm kirby3-autoid.zip; composer update; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; zip -r kirby3-autoid.zip . -x *.git*; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0'; composer dumpautoload -o;
